examples.example: 厨房里有一缸满满的清水，随时可以用来清洗食材。

translate.english: There is a tank full of clear water in the kitchen, which can be used to wash the food materials at any time.

examples.example: 爷爷在院子里放了一缸水，准备用来浇花。

translate.english: Grandfather put a tank of water in the yard, preparing to use it to water the flowers.

examples.example: 我家院子里有一缸漂亮的金鱼，给我们带来了很多欢乐。

translate.english: There is a beautiful goldfish bowl in my yard, which has brought us a lot of joy.
